GET /api.description: serves up a json representation of all the available endpoints of the api

POST /users.description: writes a new user into the database and returns the new user document

PATCH /users/:user_id.description: updates a user document and returns the updated version

GET /users.description: serves an array of all user documents

GET /content.description: returns an array of content documents

GET /content/:content_id.description: returns a specific piece of content

GET /topics.description: returns a list of all topic documents
